name: checkov-prismaless
description: Find and fix misconfigurations in infrastructure-as-code manifests like Terraform, Kubernetes, Cloudformation, Serverless framework, Arm templates using Checkov - static analysis for infrastructure as code.

checkov-prismaless.checkovVersion.title: Checkov version
checkov-prismaless.checkovVersion.markdownDescription: The Checkov scanner version to use (e.g., 2.0.123). Enter 'latest' or leave blank to always use the latest version. Be sure to run the 'Install or Update Checkov' command after changing this value. Use the 'About Checkov' command to view the current version.

checkov-prismaless.disableErrorMessage.title: Disable error message
checkov-prismaless.disableErrorMessage.markdownDescription: Stop showing error message popups (use the 'Open Checkov Log' command to view the log).

checkov-prismaless.useDebugLogs.title: Use debug logs
checkov-prismaless.useDebugLogs.markdownDescription: Whether to print debug logs from Checkov for troubleshooting

checkov-prismaless.externalChecksDir.title: External Checks Directory
checkov-prismaless.externalChecksDir.markdownDescription: Path to external checks to be added

checkov-prismaless.skipFrameworks.title: Skip Frameworks
checkov-prismaless.skipFrameworks.markdownDescription:
Filter scan to skip specific frameworks (e.g., 'arm json secrets serverless').
Add multiple frameworks using spaces.
See [Checkov Frameworks](https://www.checkov.io/2.Basics/CLI%20Command%20Reference.html) for more information.
You may need to run the extension command 'Clear Checkov results cache' after modifying this setting.

checkov-prismaless.frameworks.title: Frameworks
checkov-prismaless.frameworks.markdownDescription:
Filter scan to run only on specific frameworks (e.g., 'arm json secrets serverless').
Add multiple frameworks using spaces.
See [Checkov Frameworks](https://www.checkov.io/2.Basics/CLI%20Command%20Reference.html) for more information.
You may need to run the extension command 'Clear Checkov results cache' after modifying this setting.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
